blogPost.excerpt: Alice is an AI camera that works with your smartphone to shoot and share better content in a fraction of the time. Capture crystal clear 4K footage straight out of camera — and share it instantly to your followers.
blogPost.body: Alice is an AI camera that works with your smartphone to shoot and share better content in a fraction of the time. Capture crystal clear 4K footage straight out of camera — and share it instantly to your followers.
blogPost.title: Alice Camera - An AI camera for content creators
blogPost.author: Celina Moreno

localize.description: 爱丽丝是一款人工智能相机，它可以与智能手机配合使用，在极短的时间内拍摄并分享更好的内容。直接从相机中捕捉晶莹剔透的4K画面--并即时分享给您的追随者。
localize.tagline: 为内容创作者打造的AI相机

localize.description: 愛麗絲是一款人工智能相機，它可以與智能手機配合使用，在極短的時間內拍攝並分享更好的內容。直接從相機中捕捉晶瑩剔透的4K畫面--並即時分享給您的追隨者。
localize.tagline: 爲內容創作者打造的AI相機

previous.excerpt: At BAM, we created a set of most-used icons in 3D. Now we'd like to put our illustrations into your dispositions, you can use them for any use, our only condition is that you can't resell them as your creation and you keep our name in your credit :) Enjoy!
previous.title: BAM Free 3D Illustration Kit - More than 30 high quality 3D icons, free to use.

localize.description: 在BAM，我们创建了一套3D中最常用的图标。现在，我们想把我们的插图放到您的手中，您可以将它们用于任何用途，我们唯一的条件是您不能将它们作为您的作品转售，并且您要将我们的名字保留在您的信用中 :) 。享受吧!
localize.tagline: 30多个高质量的3D图标，免费使用。

localize.description: 在BAM，我們創建了一套3D中最常用的圖標。現在，我們想把我們的插圖放到您的手中，您可以將它們用於任何用途，我們唯一的條件是您不能將它們作爲您的作品轉售，並且您要將我們的名字保留在您的信用中 :) 。享受吧!
localize.tagline: 30多個高質量的3D圖標，免費使用。

next.excerpt: TextOptimizer is simple, fast, and efficient so that you can write well-optimized content in less than 10 minutes. 70% of our optimized pages ranked higher within 5 weeks.
next.title: Text Optimizer - Text optimization tool to rank higher in search engines

localize.description: TextOptimizer是简单、快速、高效的，所以你可以在10分钟内写出优化好的内容。我们70%的优化页面在5周内排名较高。
localize.tagline: 文字优化工具，在搜索引擎中排名更高

localize.description: TextOptimizer是簡單、快速、高效的，所以你可以在10分鐘內寫出優化好的內容。我們70%的優化頁面在5周內排名較高。
localize.tagline: 文字優化工具，在搜索引擎中排名更高
